Name: Elder Fashioned
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: "Elder" (elderflower) adds a subtle floral note to bourbon in this riff on a classic Old Fashioned .
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly at The Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Elder Fashioned contains 196 calories
